verses.plain: I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service.

tokens.t: I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God,
your reasonable service.

verses.plain: And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.

tokens.t: And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what
that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.

verses.plain: For I say, through the grace given unto me, to every man that is among you, not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think; but to think soberly, according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith.

tokens.t: For I say, through the grace given unto me, to every man that is among you, not to think
more highly than he ought to think; but to think soberly, according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith.

verses.plain: For as we have many members in one body, and all members have not the same office:

tokens.t: For as we have many members in one body, and all members have not the same office:

verses.plain: So we, being many, are one body in Christ, and every one members one of another.

tokens.t: So we,
many, are one body in Christ, and every one members one of another.

verses.plain: Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us, whether prophecy, let us prophesy according to the proportion of faith;

tokens.t: Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us, whether prophecy,
according to the proportion of faith;

verses.plain: Or ministry, let us wait on our ministering: or he that teacheth, on teaching;

tokens.t: Or ministry,
on
ministering: or he that teacheth, on teaching;

verses.plain: Or he that exhorteth, on exhortation: he that giveth, let him do it with simplicity; he that ruleth, with diligence; he that sheweth mercy, with cheerfulness.

tokens.t: Or he that exhorteth, on exhortation: he that giveth,
with simplicity; he that ruleth, with diligence; he that sheweth mercy, with cheerfulness.

verses.plain: Let love be without dissimulation. Abhor that which is evil; cleave to that which is good.

tokens.t: love be without dissimulation. Abhor that which is evil; cleave to that which is good.

verses.plain: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love; in honour preferring one another;

tokens.t: kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love; in honour preferring one another;

verses.plain: Not slothful in business; fervent in spirit; serving the Lord;

tokens.t: Not slothful in business; fervent in spirit; serving the Lord;

verses.plain: Rejoicing in hope; patient in tribulation; continuing instant in prayer;

tokens.t: Rejoicing in hope; patient in tribulation; continuing instant in prayer;

verses.plain: Distributing to the necessity of saints; given to hospitality.

tokens.t: Distributing to the necessity of saints; given to hospitality.

verses.plain: Bless them which persecute you: bless, and curse not.

tokens.t: Bless them which persecute you: bless, and curse not.

verses.plain: Rejoice with them that do rejoice, and weep with them that weep.

tokens.t: Rejoice with them that do rejoice, and weep with them that weep.

verses.plain: Be of the same mind one toward another. Mind not high things, but condescend to men of low estate. Be not wise in your own conceits.

tokens.t: of the same mind one toward another. Mind not high things, but condescend to men of low estate. Be not wise in your own conceits.

verses.plain: Recompense to no man evil for evil. Provide things honest in the sight of all men.

tokens.t: Recompense to no man evil for evil. Provide things honest in the sight of all men.

verses.plain: If it be possible, as much as lieth in you, live peaceably with all men.

tokens.t: If it be possible, as much as lieth in you, live peaceably with all men.

verses.plain: Dearly beloved, avenge not yourselves, but rather give place unto wrath: for it is written, Vengeance is mine; I will repay, saith the Lord.

tokens.t: Dearly beloved, avenge not yourselves, but
give place unto wrath: for it is written, Vengeance
mine; I will repay, saith the Lord.

verses.plain: Therefore if thine enemy hunger, feed him; if he thirst, give him drink: for in so doing thou shalt heap coals of fire on his head.

tokens.t: Therefore if thine enemy hunger, feed him; if he thirst, give him drink: for in so doing thou shalt heap coals of fire on his head.

verses.plain: Be not overcome of evil, but overcome evil with good.

tokens.t: Be not overcome of evil, but overcome evil with good.
